ing all these changed or depleted parts to make a new cycle possible.
To Explain Life
Although space doesn’t permit me to give the details of the biochemistry of
vision here, I have given the steps in my talks. Biochemists know what it
means to “explain” vision. They know the level of explanation that biologi-
cal science eventually must aim for. In order to say that some function is un-
derstood, every relevant step in the process must be elucidated. T
